name: xorshift-cpp
short_description:
This project includes files implementing xorshift*/xorshift+ PRNG 
algorithms presented here: http://xorshift.di.unimi.it/

File "reference_xorshift.h" contains the reference implementations 
of the four algorithms wrapped in classes.

Files "xorshift", "xorshift.h" and "xorshift.cpp" implement these 
algorithms as typedefs of a generalised class, implementation of 
which conforms with the standard C++11 PRN engine classes in 
<random> (i.e., it can be passed as an argument to C++11 
distribution objects just like any other standard PRN engine, can 
be used in standard engine adaptors, etc.)

File "main.cpp" can be used to verify that the provided 
implementation produces the same outputs as the reference 
implementation. It also demonstrates using xorshift1024* with a 
binomial_distribution from <random>.

Currently, the implementation requires the typedef uint64_t to be
available on the target system.
summary: Implementation of xorshift*/xorshift+ algorithms in C++
